Convert Stereo to Mono with Audacity

Here are the steps to convert a stereo track to mono:

  1. Split the Stereo track.
  2. Make both tracks mono.
  3. Use the level control for each track, found on the left of the track to set to: “Gain: -6 dB”. Then when you quick mix, it is guaranteed to not clip.
  4. Select both tracks.
  5. Project → Quick Mix
